Name: Lightning Storm
Title: Beidou: Lightning Storm
Desc: Rumbling thunder goes well with lightning storms!
Source: Reward for inviting Beidou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Lightning Storm
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1405]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1405] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14052]</color> once.
Aftern $[A1405], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14054]</color>: $[A1405]'s Normal Attacks this Round will cost 1 less $[K309]. (Can be triggered 2 times)
(You must have $[A1405] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
